tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to authorization bypass through user-controlled keys due to insufficient validation in the `emicklei/go-restful` library before version 3.8.0. An attacker could exploit this weakness to gain unauthorized access to restricted resources.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `sigs.k8s.io/gcp-compute-persistent-disk-csi-driver` library to a patch version.
